summary: Testing of NEW shipping options and admin orders features. Backend: 17/17 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All features verified - shipping selector shows 3 options, tax shows 7.5%, admin orders tab shows orders with payment status and status dropdown. Regression tests passed for products, gallery, APK download.
critical_code_review_comments: Backend correctly implements SHIPPING_RATES dict with standard ($15), priority ($25), express ($45)
GET /api/store/admin/orders returns all orders with proper structure
Frontend Cart.jsx correctly shows 3 shipping options with data-testid attributes
Frontend Cart.jsx tax label shows 7.5% correctly
Frontend AdminDashboard.jsx orders tab shows order cards with total, payment status, and status dropdown
Frontend AdminDashboard.jsx status dropdown allows changing to processing/shipped/delivered/cancelled
seed_data_creation: Multiple test orders created with different shipping methods (standard, priority, express)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Shipping options feature fully working: standard ($15, 5-7 days), priority ($25, 2-3 days), express ($45, 1-2 days). Tax rate is 7.5% NC Durham County. Admin orders tab shows 13 orders with status dropdown supporting: initiated, processing, shipped, delivered, cancelled. Orders include shipping_method field showing which option was selected. Cart total updates dynamically when shipping method changes.
